sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The XFce package contains CDE2Xfcepal, startxfce, xfbd, xfbdmgr, xfce, xfce_remove, xfce_setup, xfce_upgrade, xfclock, xfdiff, xfglob, xfgnome, xfhelp, xflock, xfmenu, xfmountdev, xfmouse, xfmouse, xfpager, xfplay, xfprint, xfrun, xfsamba, xfskin, xfsound, xfterm, xftrash, xftree, xfumed and xfwm.

sect3.title: CDE2Xfcepal
sect3.para: CDE2Xfcepal converts CDE palettes to XFce palettes.

sect3.title: startxfce
sect3.para: startxfce initializes and starts the X server using ~/.xinitrc.

sect3.title: xfbd
sect3.para: xfbd is the backdrop manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfbdmgr
sect3.para: xfbdmgr is the list manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfce
sect3.para: xfce is an easy-to-use and easy-to-configure toolbar for X11.

sect3.title: xfce_remove
sect3.para: xfce_remove is a uninstall script to remove XFce as the desktop environment are restore the previous settings.

sect3.title: xfce_setup
sect3.para: xfce_setup is a configuration script to create ~./xinitrc for XFce.

sect3.title: xfce_upgrade
sect3.para: xfce_upgrade is the configuration script used to update versions of XFce.

sect3.title: xfclock
sect3.para: xfce_clock is a clock and calendar for XFce.

sect3.title: xfdiff
sect3.para: xfdiff is a visual diff for XFce.

sect3.title: xfglob
sect3.para: xfglob is the file finder of XFce.

sect3.title: xfgnome
sect3.para: xfgnome is the GNOME compliancy module for xfwm.

sect3.title: xfhelp
sect3.para: xfhelp is script that launches a HTML browser to display online documentation.

sect3.title: xflock
sect3.para: xflock is a script used to lock the current screen during drag and drop actions.

sect3.title: xfmenu
sect3.para: xfmenu is the menu launcher for XFce.

sect3.title: xfmountdev
sect3.para: xfmountdev mounts a device on the specified mount point and launches xftree, then unmounts the device when xftree finishes.

sect3.title: xfmouse
sect3.para: xfmouse is a mouse configurator for XFce.

sect3.title: xfpager
sect3.para: xfpager is the pager of xfwm.

sect3.title: xfplay
sect3.para: xfplay is a script that executes the play program (not included in package.

sect3.title: xfprint
sect3.para: xfprint is a minimalist printing wrapper to be used as a drag and drop action for the XFce front panel.

sect3.title: xfrun
sect3.para: xfrun is the program launcher for XFce.

sect3.title: xfsamba
sect3.para: xfsamba is Samba front end for XFce.

sect3.title: xfskin
sect3.para: xfskin is a script to manage themes for XFce.

sect3.title: xfsound
sect3.para: xfsound is the sound server for XFce.

sect3.title: xfterm
sect3.para: xfterm is a small terminal wrapper to be used as a drag and drop action for the XFce front panel.

sect3.title: xftrash
sect3.para: xftrash is a small script to be used as a drag and drop action for the XFce front panel.

sect3.title: xftree
sect3.para: xftree is the file manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfumed
sect3.para: xfumed is the user menu editor for XFce.

sect3.title: xfwm
sect3.para: xfwm is a window manager for X11.
